item.title: An example journal article
item.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis posuere tellus ac convallis placerat. Proin tincidunt magna sed ex sollicitudin condimentum.

Juan José is from Lima, Peru. He is a second-year PhD student in Bilingualism and Second Language Acquisition at Rutgers University. He holds a bachelor’s degree in Education with a concentration in English Language Teaching from Universidad Nacional Federico Villarreal (Lima, Peru). He obtained a master’s degree in Spanish Language and Literature from Auburn University. His experience teaching both English and Spanish as a second language inspired his interest in how L2 learners and bilinguals process, perceive, and acquire language.
